channel.title: 代码样例速查 on Yipsen Ye

item.title: Java 代码样例速查
item.description:
多线程发起请求并合并结果

// 退群记录
CompletableFuture<Collection<Long>> leaveGroupFuture = queryUserLeftGroupId(userAccount, st, m);
// 群信息变更记录
CompletableFuture<Collection<Long>> infoChangedGroupFuture = queryInfoChangedGroupId(corpIdList, groupIdList, st, m);
// 群成员变更记录
CompletableFuture<Collection<Long>> memberChangedGroupFuture = queryMemberChangedGroupId(corpIdList, groupIdList, st, m);
// 群头像变更记录
CompletableFuture<Collection<Long>> iconChangedGroupFuture = queryIconChangedGroupId(corpIdList, groupIdList, m);
// 不活跃群记录
CompletableFuture<Collection<Long>> inactiveGroupFuture = queryInactiveGroupId(corpIdList, leaveGroupFuture, st, m);
// 群成员信息
CompletableFuture<Collection<GroupMemberInfo>> memberInfoQueryFuture = infoChangedGroupFuture.thenCombineAsync(memberChangedGroupFuture, (x1, x2) -> queryGroupMemberInfo(x1, x2, userAccount), executor);

// 查询变更的群详情，需要等待信息和成员变更查询结束
CompletableFuture.allOf(infoChangedGroupFuture, memberChangedGroupFuture).join();
Collection<Long> infoChangedGroupIdList = infoChangedGroupFuture.join();
Collection<Long> memberChangedGroupIdList = memberChangedGroupFuture.join();

// 群详情
CompletableFuture<Collection<GroupInfo>> groupInfoQueryFuture = leaveGroupFuture.thenApplyAsync(FunctionWrapper.wrap(x -> queryChangedGroupInfo(infoChangedGroupIdList, x, memberChangedGroupIdList)));

// 等待结果
CompletableFuture.allOf(groupInfoQueryFuture, iconChangedGroupFuture, inactiveGroupFuture, memberInfoQueryFuture).join();

// 构建响应
GroupChangeQueryResponse response = responseBuilder
    .addAllGroupInfo(groupInfoQueryFuture.join())
    .addAllMemberInfo(memberInfoQueryFuture.join())
    .addAllIconChangedGroupId(iconChangedGroupFuture.join())
    .addAllMemberChangedGroupId(memberChangedGroupIdList)
    .addAllInactiveGroupId(inactiveGroupFuture.join())
    .build();

等待回执确认结果

private final Cache<String, Timeout> timeoutCache = CacheBuilder.newBuilder().expireAfterWrite(4, TimeUnit.SECONDS).build();

private HashedWheelTimer ackCheckTimer = new HashedWheelTimer();

// 1. 发起超时检查任务
public void checkAck(SocketMessage message) {
    Timeout timeout = ackCheckTimer.newTimeout(new AckCheckTask(session, message), getAckWaitTimeoutSec(), TimeUnit.SECONDS);
    timeoutCache.put(getKey(sessionId, sequenceId), timeout);
}

// 2. 如果超时时间窗口内有响应（回执）回来，则取消超时检查的任务
public void cleanCacheData(String sessionId, String sequenceId) {
    String key = getKey(sessionId, sequenceId);
    Timeout timeout = timeoutCache.getIfPresent(key);
    if (timeout != null) {
        log.debug("cancel check ack task. session id:{}, sequence id:{}", StringTool.desensitizeStr(sessionId), sequenceId);
        timeout.cancel();
        timeoutCache.invalidate(key);
    }

    log.debug("clean cache message. session id:{}, sequence id:{}", StringTool.desensitizeStr(sessionId), sequenceId);
    Session session = SessionManager.getInstance().getSessionByMaaSessionId(sessionId);
    if (session != null) {
        AffirmMsgManager.getInstance().cheanCacheMsg(session, CloudCodeConst.CHAT_NOTIFY, sequenceId);
    }
}

public class AckCheckTask implements TimerTask {

    private SocketMessage message;

    private Session session;

    private String traceId;

    public AckCheckTask(Session session, SocketMessage message) {
        this.session = session;
        this.message = message;
        this.traceId = MDC.get(GrpcCommonConstant.TRACE_ID_KEY);
    }

    // 3. 如果到时间 timeout 了，任务还没有被清除掉即触发了超时动作
    @Override
    public void run() {
        MDC.put(GrpcCommonConstant.TRACE_ID_KEY, traceId);
        String sessionId = session.getMaaSessionId();
        String sequenceId = getSequenceId(message);

        if (timeout.isCancelled()) {
            log.debug("task is cancelled. session id:{}, sequence id:{}", StringTool.desensitizeStr(sessionId), sequenceId);
            return;
        }

        if (StringUtils.isEmpty(sequenceId)) {
            log.warn("sequence id is illegal. session id:{}, sequence id:{}", StringTool.desensitizeStr(sessionId), sequenceId);
            return;
        }

        log.warn("wait client ack timeout. session id:{}, sequence id:{}", StringTool.desensitizeStr(sessionId), sequenceId);
        transferToSendPushMessage(session, sequenceId);
    }

    private String getSequenceId(SocketMessage message) {
        return message != null ? String.valueOf(message.getSequenceId()) : StringUtils.EMPTY;
    }
}

采用事件来收集原子逻辑，事件的处理可同步，也可异步

通过配置的KEY来控制是否加载对应的配置

@ConditionalOnProperty(value = Config.KUBENETES_DISABLE_AUTO_CONFIG_SYSTEM_PROPERTY, havingValue = "false", matchIfMissing = true)

替换 Map 里的 value

protected Object getClassLoadingLock(String className) {
    Object lock = this;
    if (parallelLockMap != null) {
        Object new Lock = new Object();
        lock = parallelLockMap.putIfAbsent(className, newLock);
        if (lock == null) {
            lock = newLock;
        }
    }
    return lock;
}

item.title: NodeJS 代码样例速查
item.description:
删除文件夹

const fs = require('fs');
const path = require('path');

function delDir(folderpath) {
 if (fs.existsSync(folderpath)) {
  let files = fs.readdirSync(folderpath);
  files.forEach((file, index) => {
   let curPath = path.join(folderpath, file);
   console.log(curPath);
   if (fs.statSync(curPath).isDirectory()) {
    delDir(curPath);
   } else {
    fs.unlinkSync(curPath);
   }
  });
  fs.rmdirSync(folderpath);
 }
}

item.title: Python 代码样例速查
item.description:
遍历文件夹下所有文件名

import os

for filename in os.listdir(target_folder_path):
    print(filename)

遍历文件夹下所有文件名（递归）

import os

ROOT_PATH = r''

for root, dirs, files in os.walk(ROOT_PATH):
    for file in files:
        path = os.path.join(root, file)
        size = os.path.getsize(path)
        # 清空空文件夹？？？待确认
        if size == 0:
            print(path, size)
            os.remove(path)

连接文件路径

import os

for filename in os.listdir(target_folder_path):
    file_path = os.path.join(target_folder_path, filename)
    print(file_path)

移动文件

import shutil

shutil.move(source_path, target_path)

复制文件

import shutil

shutil.copyfile(source_path, target_path)
shutil.copy2(source_path, target_path)

判断是否文件或文件夹

import os

if os.path.isfile(target_path):
    return True

if os.path.isdir(target_path):
    return True

创建文件夹

import os

try:
    os.mkdir(target_path)
except FileExistsError:
    print("%s already EXIST!", target_path)
else:
    logger.info("%s created.", target_path)

移除文件夹

import os

os.rmdir(target_path)

移除空文件夹

import os

SOURCE_PATH = r'E:\target'

folder_names = os.listdir(SOURCE_PATH)

for folder_name in folder_names:
    folder_path = os.path.join(SOURCE_PATH, folder_name)
    try:
        os.rmdir(folder_path)
        print("removed empty folder: %s" % folder_path)
    except OSError as e:
        print("%s is not empty: %s" % (folder_path, e))

读随机数（带权重）

import random

PART_COUNT = random.choices([0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5], weights=[20, 2, 1, 3, 2, 1], k=300)

执行CMD命令

import os

os.system(r"echo hello world")

读取Json文件到string

import json

with open(json_file, 'r', encoding='utf8') as j:
    data = json.loads(j)

读取Json文件到dict

import json

with open(json_file, 'r', encoding='utf8') as j:
    data = json.load(j)

读取Json文件到dict（带引号问题）

import json

with open(meta_file, 'r', encoding='UTF-8') as f:
    data = f.read()
    meta = json.loads(json.dumps(eval(data)))

记录时间到文件里，用于断点继续

import os
import time

# file to store time string which is time of last run.
TM_TIME_FILE = r"last_modified.time"

def get_target_modified_time():
    # IMPORTANT: open mode cannot be a+, must be r, otherwise the readline function will return except result.
    with open(TM_TIME_FILE, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
        target_modified_time = f.readline()
        return r"1971-01-01 00:00:00" if len(target_modified_time) == 0 else target_modified_time


def set_target_modified_time(target_modified_time):
    with open(TM_TIME_FILE, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:
        f.write(target_modified_time)
        f.flush()

if __name__ == "__main__":
    # read target modified time from file.
    tm_time_str = get_target_modified_time()
    tm_time = time.mktime(time.strptime(tm_time_str, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"))

    # update next target modified time as current time to file.
    next_tm_time = time.time()
    next_tm_time_str = time.strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S", time.localtime(next_tm_time))
    # should create a lock file to handle except situation so that can update back the original target modified time
    set_target_modified_time(next_tm_time_str)
    
    # filter out target files which updated after tm_time.
    files = [b for b in os.listdir(SOURCE) if tm_time <= os.stat(os.path.join(SOURCE, b)).st_mtime <= next_tm_time]

    # TODO: your code here...

使用多线程运行

import concurrent.futures

tasks = os.listdir(TASK_PATH) # TODO: 获取需要执行的任务列表

totally = len(tasks) # 运行总任务数
success = 0 # 运行成功数
failure = 0 # 运行失败数
# 打开线程池，池大小100个线程
with concurrent.futures.ThreadPoolExecutor(max_workers=100) as executor:
    # 将任务提交，并获取对应future
    futures = {executor.submit(process, task): task for task in tasks}
    # 判断线程任务是否已完成，即future是否completed
    for future in concurrent.futures.as_completed(futures):
        try:
            # 获取线程结果
            if future.result():
                success += 1
            else:
                failure += 1
        except Exception as e:
            # 线程运行出现异常
            print('exception raised.', e)
            failure += 1
        # 计算并打印运行情况的统计信息
        progress = (success + failure)/totally * 100
        print("[%s] success: %d, failure: %d, progress: %.2f %%", futures[future], success, failure, progress)

def process(task):
    # TODO: your code here...
    return True

使用数据库连接池

from DBUtils.PooledDB import PooledDB
import pymysql


MAX_CONNECTIONS = 10

pool = PooledDB(
    pymysql,
    MAX_CONNECTIONS,
    host='192.168.0.200',
    port=33066,
    user='PRIVATE_THEATER',
    passwd='nvjQ0FsR$Cu5*csF',
    db='PRIVATE_THEATER',
    use_unicode=True)

# 查询一条表数据
def select_one(name):
    conn = pool.connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    cursor.execute(r"SELECT id FROM table WHERE name = '%s'" % name)
    return cursor.fetchone()

# 查询多条表数据
def select_list(size):
    conn = pool.connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    cursor.execute(r'SELECT * FROM table WHERE process_status = 0 ORDER BY id LIMIT %d' % size)
    return cursor.fetchall()

# 更新多条表数据
def update_list():
    conn = pool.connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    cursor.execute(r'UPDATE table SET process_status = 0, process_time = now() WHERE process_status = 0')
    conn.commit()

# 插入表数据并获得id
def insert():
    conn = pool.connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    insert_sql = r"INSERT INTO table (code, name, created_time, creator, updated_time, updator, version, deleted) " \
                 r"VALUES ('%s', '%s', now(), 'SYSADMIN', now(), 'SYSADMIN', 0, 0)"  % ('code', 'name')
    cursor.execute(insert_sql)
    conn.commit()
    id = cursor.lastrowid
    return id

# 删除表数据
def delete_list():
    pass

# 异常回滚
def rollback():
    conn = pool.connection()
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    try:
        # TODO: your code here...
        conn.commit()
    except Exception as e:
        conn.rollback()
        raise e
    finally:
        cursor.close()
        conn.close()

使用日志 - 基本配置

import logging.config

# 简单配置
logging.basicConfig(filename=r'./logs/application.log',
                    level=logging.DEBUG,
                    format='%(asctime)s [%(levelname)s] [L%(lineno)d] %(message)s ',
                    datefmt='%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')

# 获取logger
logger = logging.getLogger("default")

# 使用
logger.debug('this is debug log.')
logger.info('this is info log.')
logger.warning('this is warning log.')
logger.error('this is error exception raised.')

使用日志 - 自定义配置（内嵌配置信息）

# LOGGER CONFIG
#####################################################################################################################
import logging.config


LOG_PATH = r'./logs/'

# 自定义配置
log_config = {
    "version": 1,
    'disable_existing_loggers': False,  # 是否禁用现有的记录器

    # 日志管理器集合
    'loggers': {
        # 管理器
        'default': {
            'handlers': ['console', 'info_file', 'error_file'],
            'level': 'DEBUG',
            'propagate': True,  # 是否传递给父记录器
        },
        'sql': {
            'handlers': ['sql_file'],
            'level': 'DEBUG',
            'propagate': True,  # 是否传递给父记录器
        }
    },

    # 处理器集合
    'handlers': {
        # 输出到控制台
        'console': {
            'level': 'INFO',  # 输出信息的最低级别
            'class': 'logging.StreamHandler',
            'formatter': 'standard',  # 使用standard格式
        },
        # 输出到文件
        'info_file': {
            'level': 'INFO',
            'class': 'logging.handlers.TimedRotatingFileHandler',
            'formatter': 'standard',
            'filename': LOG_PATH + 'info.log',  # 输出位置
            'when': 'h',  # 每小时一个日志文件
            'backupCount': 10,  # 备份份数
            'encoding': 'utf8',  # 文件编码
        },
        # 输出到文件
        'error_file': {
            'level': 'ERROR',
            'class': 'logging.handlers.TimedRotatingFileHandler',
            'formatter': 'standard',
            'filename': LOG_PATH + 'error.log',
            'when': 'h',
            'backupCount': 10,
            'encoding': 'utf8',
        },
        # 输出到文件
        'sql_file': {
            'level': 'DEBUG',
            'class': 'logging.handlers.TimedRotatingFileHandler',
            'formatter': 'standard',
            'filename': LOG_PATH + 'sql.log',
            'when': 'h',
            'backupCount': 10,
            'encoding': 'utf8',
        },
    },
    # 日志格式集合
    'formatters': {
        # 标准输出格式
        'standard': {
            # [具体时间][线程名:线程ID][日志名字:日志级别名称(日志级别ID)] [输出的模块:输出的函数]:日志内容
            'format': '%(asctime)s [%(levelname)s] [L%(lineno)d] %(message)s '
        }
    }
}


# 使用自定义配置并获取logger
logging.config.dictConfig(log_config)
logger = logging.getLogger("default")
sql_logger = logging.getLogger("sql") # 使用此logger会打印到sql.log文件

# 使用
logger.debug('this is debug log.')
logger.info('this is info log.')
logger.warning('this is warning log.')
logger.error('this is error exception raised.')

使用日志 - 自定义配置（独立配置文件）

一、日志配置文件（例如文件名为：logging.conf）

item.title: Shell 代码样例速查
item.description:
打印日志

#!/bin/bash
###############################################################
# Program:
#       This program for upload batch of pictures to nimg.
# History:
#
# Ver Date  Author Actvity
# --- ----  ------ -------
# 1.0 2018/12/10 Yipsen First release
###############################################################

###############################################################
SOURCE_PATH="/mnt/resource/"
TARGET_URL="http://192.168.1.102:9000/02/upload"

#Folder path
HOME_PATH=""
WORKING_PATH="${HOME_PATH}/working/image_`date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S_$$`"
OUTPUT_PATH="${HOME_PATH}/output"
LOG_PATH="${HOME_PATH}/logs"

#Log File
LOG_FILE="${LOG_PATH}/UploadToNimg_`date +%Y-%m-%d`.log"

#Json File
ACTOR_JSON_FILE="${OUTPUT_PATH}/actor_`date +%Y-%m-%d`.log"
MOVIE_JSON_FILE="${OUTPUT_PATH}/movie_`date +%Y-%m-%d`.log"

###############################################################
function Initialize() {
# logInfo "----- Initialize - Initialize log file/archive file is starting."
# if [ -f ${LOG_FILE} ];
# then
#  chmod 755 ${LOG_FILE}
# else
#  touch ${LOG_FILE}
#  chmod 755 ${LOG_FILE}
#  logInfo "----- Initialize - New log file is created."
# fi
# logInfo "----- Initialize - Initialize log file/archive file successfully."
}

function Upload_folders() {
 logInfo "----- Upload folders - Start upload folders."
 
 #1. 
 if [[ ! -d ${WORKING_PATH} ]]; then
  mkdir -p ${WORKING_PATH}
  logInfo "----- Upload folders - New working folder is created --> ${WORKING_PATH}."
 fi
 
 #2.
 target_folders=`find ${SOURCE_PATH} -iname "*"`
 
 #3.
 if [[ "${target_folders}" = "" ]]; then
  #3.1
  rm -rf ${WORKING_PATH}
  logInfo "----- Upload folders - No folders need to upload. working folder [${WORKING_PATH}] is deleted."
  logInfo "===================== End Upload to Nimg ====================="
  exit
 else
  #3.2
  a=0
  for folder_name in `find ${SOURCE_PATH}/* -type d -printf '%f\n'`; do
   folder_list[$a]=${folder_name}
   let "a+=1"
  done
  
  #3.3
  aid=1
  mid=1
  for folder in "${folder_list[@]}"; do
   source_folder_path="${SOURCE_PATH}"\/"S{folder}"
   logInfo "----- Upload folders - Copy source folder to working path."
   cp -a ${source_folder_path} ${WORKING_PATH}
   
   working_folder_path="${WORKING_PATH}"\/"${folder}"
   Upload_files ${working_folder_path}
   Output_Actor $aid $folder
   
   rmdir ${working_folder_path}
   logInfo "----- Upload folders - Upload ${working_folder_path} done. folder deleted."
  done
 fi
}

function Upload_files() {
 IFS=$'\n'
 OLDIFS="$IFS"
 for file in `find $1 -type f -printf '%f\n'`; do
  file_path="${1}"\/"${file}"
  
  logInfo "----- Upload files - Start to upload file - ${file_path}"
  Output_Movie $mid $aid $file `curl -F "userfile=@${file_path}" ${TARGET_URL} | grep "url"`
  
  rm -f ${file_path}
  logInfo "----- Upload files - End to upload file - ${file_path}, file deleted."
  let "mid+=1"
 done
 IFS="$OLDIFS"
}

function Output_Actor() {
 echo "{\"id\": \"$1\", \"name\": \"$2\"}">>${ACTOR_JSON_FILE}
}

function Output_Movie() {
 echo "{\"id\": \"$1\", \"aid\": \"$2\", \"name\": \"$3\", $4}">>${MOVIE_JSON_FILE}
}

###############################################################
logInfo() {
 timestamp=`date +%Y-%m-%d\ %H:%M:%S`
 echo "[$timestamp $$] INFO====== $1"
}
logWarn() {
 timestamp=`date +%Y-%m-%d\ %H:%M:%S`
 echo "[$timestamp $$] WARN====== $1"
}
logError() {
 timestamp=`date +%Y-%m-%d\ %H:%M:%S`
 echo "[$timestamp $$] ERROR====== $1"
}

###############################################################
main() {
 logInfo "===================== Start Upload to Nimg ==================="
 Initialize
 Upload_folders
 logInfo "===================== End Upload to Nimg ====================="
}

###############################################################
main 1>>${LOG_FILE} 2>>${LOG_FILE}
